website_summaries.verdict: This radio comes with tons of features to keep you jamming all day long.
pros: Bluetooth pairs perfectly with your Apple or Android device offering your favorite music, directions, and voice commands seamlessly
Lots of customization provided for sound, color, and power
cons: Several users reported the system resetting itself

customer_reviews.title: Sony vs Pioneer
customer_reviews.text: The age old battle between car audio gurus...pioneer still edges out sony..this unit (mex xb120bt) was compared to pioneer deh80prs...pioneer is way ahead of sony in this one...the mex felt like it was put together by a child...buttons all over the place..until you used the Sony app..which was awesome...but you shouldn't hAVE to use your phone to control your head unit ...sony unit was very hard to navigate...hands down,pioneer wins all day long
customer_reviews.author: Cheffdave

customer_reviews.title: great head unit with plenty of features and power/sound quality
customer_reviews.text: huge improvement over my last head unit and luckily for me my stock wiring was the same gauge as the head units connector wires so no extra wires needed to be ran to the battery setup was fairly simple of course there was a lot to learn first with there being so many features but not too long after messing around with it i discovered the sony music center app which helps to control the head unit making it the easiest to use head unit i've ever had, on par with a double din touchscreen i've used before.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Instructions  written by engineers
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, I'm an older person ( non tech ), what is wrong with step-by-step instructions? What the heck is the "C" button for color? Come on!!!! I have spent way more time trying to operate the thing ( without complete success ) then it took to install in my 1997 Dodge truck. Get real people to wright simple instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Ross

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. I've had it installed for a few months now. It will blow your speakers if your not careful! I currently have kicker KS 6x9 in the rear and kicker KS 4x6 in the front and you really have to fade to the rear to keep the fronts from popping
customer_reviews.author: bradley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a lot of great features and power. The problem is the "Outlut Error" message displayed a few times a day. When this happens you must reset the unit, loosing all settings you have made. I wish I would have read the reviews elsewhere, it is a very common issue. Sony of course only gives the typical scripted response, "Reset unit and Have it wired by a professional installer". I have installed 100+ units throughout the years and have never need a "professional". Do yourself a favor and buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great  Having a lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome RADIO. I have only one concern with the Sony MEX-XB120BT Car Stereo , It's hard to program it when you have amps subs and multiple types of speakers in the back Very easy to install For the value its fantastic Sounds great Having a lot of fun with it Powerful system, and the microphone. for the my cell phone works good I like the fact that it is camouflage while installed and sitting in my car, because when you look in it you really can't tell it is an awesome system , so therefore there is a good chance someone won't brake in and grip it

customer_reviews.title: The unit that ROCKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey there u guys. I have a 2000 Camaro and the last head unit I had was a Kenwood. Its sounded good but not enough power. This head unit paired with the Rockford Fosgate Punch 1675 speakers I purchased now sounds like sitting in the front row of a concert. I very impressed with the output power with no need for an Amp. I've got one minor issue, which is there r no bass, midrange, or treble settings just the EQ presets. That being said I would most definitely recommend this unit.

I'm VERY impressed with the sound quality and volume improvement for a reasonable price. It was super easy to install because all the wires were an exact color coordinated match from the previous unit.
customer_reviews.author: ernstrr

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Built-in amp; what more could you want? Look, this is the "I don't need to be obnoxious but I enjoy great sound" car stereo. New 6s in front, new 6x9s in back, this thing in the console makes for a great, inexpensive setup that sounds amazing! I didn't run the mic, but the option still exists. This is everything I've wanted in a car stereo: easy to use, easy to customize, and pushes enough power to the speakers to sound badass!

product_meta.title: Sony MEX-XB120BT Single DIN Hi-Power Bluetooth In-Dash CD/AM/FM/SiriusXM Ready Car Stereo with 180W RMS (CEA Rated Power) built-in 4-channel 45W x 4 Amplifier
product_meta.description: Enjoy simple control and deep, clean sound throughout the car. Music, navigation, messaging, and call features are all easy to use thanks to a new and improved interface and voice control. Extra bass and a powerful amp bring every track to life.
feature_bullets: Pairing made easy: NFC lets you connect your Bluetooth phone instantly. Just tap it once on the volume knob for easy pairing.
Control with your voice: use voice commands to get directions, play music, and communicate with contacts on your smartphone.
High-power amp: the four-channel amp gives you a level of power previously only available from external amps, built in.
Bring Siri on the road: hook up your iOS Device to control music, navigation, Messaging and more with Siri eyes free.
Voice control for Android: use voice control to get directions, send messages, and play tracks on your Android smartphone.
